name: chain wrench
description: A handmade chain wrench crafted from scraps, held together with an adjustable screw.  A leather grip prevents it from sliding.

name: mini hacksaw
description: A hand-sized hacksaw, made from a wooden frame and a saw-toothed blade carved from metal.  Not precise enough for most tasks.

name: homemade mallet
description: This mallet has been carefully carved from wood and has strong metal caps.  A decent weapon and passable hammer.
//: No hammer use action because it's a mallet and can't pull out nails

name: handyman's tackle
description: A small toolbox filled with handcrafted tools.  Adequate for most construction projects, but only barely.

name: foiled aluminum can
description: A soda can can with a makeshift lid of aluminum foil.  It's watertight, as long as you're gentle with it.

name: macrofridge
description: A vehicle-mounted minifridge that's been enlarged with several metal sheets.  It takes more power to keep things cold, but it holds more.

name: MetalMaster forge buddy
description: From the makers of the best-selling* FOODCO kitchen buddy comes the MetalMaster forge buddy, for all your metalworking and welding needs!  It's just as clunky and awkward as the thing it's spinning off, and still requires a vehicle battery to function.

name: cooking rig
description: Skillet, pot, hotplate, and chemistry set; everything you need to cook food and chemicals.  Includes proper fume vents and a separator, so you don't contaminate your food with toxic chemicals.

name: reinforced hand mirror
description: A small hand mirror, reinforced with a steel mesh to protect it from harm.

name: cocktail belt
description: This leather belt has been enlarged to be slung around the chest, and has two loops shaped to store Molotov cocktails.
